DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Walk Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's ability, during the past week, to walk.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Walk
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's ability to walk.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Concepts.definition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Property.preferredName: During Past Week Ability to Walk
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about an individual's ability to walk.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about an individual's ability to walk.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of an individual's ability to walk.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to walk at all.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to walk at all.

PermissibleValues.value: Unable to walk alone, even with walking equipment.  Able to walk short distances with the help of another person, and required a wheelchair to get around the neighborhood
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Unable to Walk Alone, Even with Walking Equipment; Able to Walk Short Distances with Help; Require Wheelchair to Get Around the Neighborhood

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Unable to Walk Alone, Even with Walking Equipment; Able to Walk Short Distances with Help; Require Wheelchair to Get Around the Neighborhood
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to walk alone, even with walking equipment, but was able to walk short distances with the help of another person and required a wheelchair to get around the neighborhood.

Concepts.longName: Unable to Walk Alone, Even with Walking Equipment; Able to Walk Short Distances with Help; Require Wheelchair to Get Around the Neighborhood
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to walk alone, even with walking equipment, but was able to walk short distances with the help of another person and required a wheelchair to get around the neighborhood.

PermissibleValues.value: Able to walk only short distances with walking equipment, and required a wheelchair to get around the neighborhood
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Able to Walk Only Short Distances with Walking Equipment; Required a Wheelchair to Get Around the Neighborhood

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Able to Walk Only Short Distances with Walking Equipment; Required a Wheelchair to Get Around the Neighborhood
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to walk only short distances with walking equipment and required a wheelchair to get around the neighborhood.

Concepts.longName: Able to Walk Only Short Distances with Walking Equipment; Required a Wheelchair to Get Around the Neighborhood
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to walk only short distances with walking equipment and required a wheelchair to get around the neighborhood.

PermissibleValues.value: Able to walk around the neighborhood with walking equipment, but without the help of another person
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood with Walking Equipment; No Help Required

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood with Walking Equipment; No Help Required
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to walk around the neighborhood with walking equipment, but without the help of another person.

Concepts.longName: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood with Walking Equipment; No Help Required
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to walk around the neighborhood with walking equipment, but without the help of another person.

PermissibleValues.value: Able to walk around the neighborhood with difficulty; but did not require walking equipment or the help of another person
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood with Difficulty; No Walking Equipment or Help Required

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood with Difficulty; No Walking Equipment or Help Required
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to walk around the neighborhood with difficulty, but did not require walking equipment or the help of another person.

Concepts.longName: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood with Difficulty; No Walking Equipment or Help Required
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to walk around the neighborhood with difficulty, but did not require walking equipment or the help of another person.

PermissibleValues.value: Able to walk around the neighborhood without difficulty, and without walking equipment
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood Without Difficulty; No Walking Equipment Needed

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood Without Difficulty; No Walking Equipment Needed
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to walk around the neighborhood without difficulty and without walking equipment.

Concepts.longName: Able to Walk Around Neighborhood Without Difficulty; No Walking Equipment Needed
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to walk around the neighborhood without difficulty and without walking equipment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueDomain.origin: HUI:Health Utilities Index; Feeny et al., Health Utilities Index Chapter 26 In Bert Spilker, ed. Quality of Life and Pharmacoeconomics in Clinical Trials. Second Edition. Philadelphia: Lippincott-Raven Press, 1996, pp 239-252.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Which one of the following be
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which one of the following best describes the subject's ability, during the past week, to walk? Note:  Walking equipment refers to mechanical supports such as braces, a cane, crutches or a walker.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which one of the following best describes your ability, during the past week, to walk?

DataElement.origin: HUI:Health Utilities Index; Feeny et al., Health Utilities Index Chapter 26 In Bert Spilker, ed. Quality of Life and Pharmacoeconomics in Clinical Trials. Second Edition. Philadelphia: Lippincott-Raven Press, 1996, pp 239-252.
